title: JavaScript Arrays
description: Learn to create, access, and manipulate arrays with push, pop, and slice methods.
constraints: Create an array with at least three elements.
Use push() to add an element.
Use pop() to remove the last element.
Use slice() to create a subarray.
starterCode:
let fruits = ["Mango", "Orange", "Grapes"];
// Write your array operations here
hints: push() adds to the end of an array.
slice(start, end) copies part of the array.
You can log arrays with console.log().
